description:
The Young Feathers (年少組, literally "Group of Few Years") are the younger ones amongst the Haibane of http://anidb.net/ch26011 [Old Home]. Unlike the older Haibane, these kids don`t have to work for their living, and are taken care of by http://anidb.net/ch9899 [Reki] and the old http://anidb.net/ch14487 [Housemother].
As the Haibane of the http://anidb.net/ch26012 [Abandoned Factory] can`t take care of their younger ones they send them to Old Home as well, and these kids visit their home only few times a year.
name: Nen-Shou Gumi
